nodes.text: Fellon base was a hidden Imperial base located in the city of Fellon on the planet of Halmad.

In 7 ABY, Wraith Squadron disguised as the pirate group Hawk-bat Independent Space Force launched an attack on Fellon base as part of Operation Groundquake. The Wraiths were surprised when the base suddenly activated its shields and three squadrons of TIE Fighters and Interceptors flew out and engaged the Wraiths.
